channel.title: Multifactor Authentication (MFA) :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Multifactor Authentication (MFA) Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Description: Explain the basic concept of MFA, and the difference between a Authentication Factor and an Authenticator. Why is this here?: At Oktane 2023, 20% of respondents placed “Multi-factor Authentication” under “IAM Fundamentals”. After discussions with employees (and probably customers as well) there is a misunderstanding of what is a “Factor” and what is an Authenticator".
